parameter.name: postProcFreq
parameter.description: Interval in minutes to compute envelopes and update events JSON database

parameter.name: APPSpath
parameter.description: Path to save/update config for all apps

parameter.name: JSONpath
parameter.description: Path to save/update config for all apps

parameter.name: fdTypes
parameter.description: Types of magnitude FinDer allowed

parameter.name: alert
parameter.description: If scqcalert dashboard available. alertpath required

parameter.name: alertpath
parameter.description: Path to scqcalert dashboard

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Bind address of the server. "0.0.0.0" allows any interface to conect to this server

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Server port

parameter.name: mapboxtoken
parameter.description: App key to use custom maps with mapbox

parameter.name: extquery
parameter.description: Use external catalog to evaluate events

parameter.name: fdsnwsname
parameter.description: fdsnws service name to use for external catalog

parameter.name: agency
parameter.description: Agency name

parameter.name: fdsnwsclient
parameter.description: Route to fdsnws service

parameter.name: deltatime
parameter.description: Delta time in minutes to compare events against external catalog

parameter.name: deltadist
parameter.description: Delta distance in degrees to compare events against external catalog

parameter.name: magtypes
parameter.description: EEW magnitude types allowed to show in events dashboard

parameter.name: latmin
parameter.description: Minimum latitude allowed to show in events dashboard (value used in external catalog queries)

parameter.name: latmax
parameter.description: Maximum latitude allowed to show in events dashboard (value used in external catalog queries)

parameter.name: lonmin
parameter.description: Minimum longitude allowed to show in events dashboard (value used in external catalog queries)

parameter.name: lonmax
parameter.description: Maximum longitude allowed to show in events dashboard (value used in external catalog queries)

parameter.name: latrmin
parameter.description: Minimum latitude network region allowed to show in events dashboard (value used in external catalog queries)

parameter.name: latrmax
parameter.description: Maximum latitude network region allowed to show in events dashboard (value used in external catalog queries)

parameter.name: lonrmin
parameter.description: Minimum longitude network region allowed to show in events dashboard (value used in external catalog queries)

parameter.name: lonrmax
parameter.description: Maximum longitude network region allowed to show in events dashboard (value used in external catalog queries)

parameter.name: jsonpath
parameter.description: Path to query events information

parameter.name: distint
parameter.description: Distance in km to compute intensity using allen 2012

parameter.name: fpstatus
parameter.description: Show FP delay information in the histogram events dashboard

parameter.name: deltadays
parameter.description: Delta in days to select initial period to show in events dashboard

parameter.name: minmag
parameter.description: Minumum magnitude use in the initial range to show in events dashboard

parameter.name: maxmag
parameter.description: Maximum magnitude use in the initial range to show in events dashboard

parameter.name: cmaplat
parameter.description: Initial latitude to center map

parameter.name: cmaplon
parameter.description: Initial longitude to center map

parameter.name: zoomap
parameter.description: Initial Zoom map 0 to 20

parameter.name: evejsonpath
parameter.description: Path to query event envelope information

parameter.name: phases
parameter.description: List of phases for which to compute theoretical times

parameter.name: colors
parameter.description: List of colors to show phases selected phases

parameter.name: model
parameter.description: Velocity model used to compute theroic arrivals

parameter.name: fdsnwsclientwf
parameter.description: Route to fdsnws service to query waveforms

parameter.name: eveminmag
parameter.description: Minumum magnitude use in the initial range to show in event dashboard

parameter.name: evemaxmag
parameter.description: Maximum magnitude use in the initial range to show in events dashboard

parameter.name: evedeltadays
parameter.description: Delta in days to select initial period to show in event dashboard

parameter.name: timebefore
parameter.description: Time in seconds before pick to extract wavefrom

parameter.name: timeafter
parameter.description: Time in seconds after pick to extract wavefrom
